sense.gloss: to disentangle, to untangle, to unravel
to relax, to soften, to relieve (e.g. stress, tension), to remove (e.g. doubt)

sdata.j: ↑海↑↓うみ↓の↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓を↑解↑↓|と↓きほぐす|ことは↑誰↑↓だれ↓にできるだろうか。
sdata.e: Who shall ever unravel the mysteries of the sea?

sdata.j: ↑海↑↓うみ↓の↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓を↑解↑↓|と↓きほぐす|ことは↑誰↑↓だれ↓にできるだろうか。
sdata.e: Who is able to reveal the mysteries of the sea?
